overview: Taggart's family is slaughtered by a rival rancher.  Taggart mortally wounds the rancher and kills his son. Before he dies the rancher hires three bounty hunters to avenge him with the promise of $5000 as a reward. Taggart must flee into Apache territory to escape the wrath of the trio of hired killers.
tagline: THE GIRL...THE APACHES..AND THE GOLD...TAKE THEM...THEY'RE ALL WAITING FOR YOU!
title: Taggart
